korean: 몇 시간만 안 봐도 메시지가 엄청 쌓이더라.
친구들이 점심에 뭐 먹었는지부터 시작해서 온갖 얘기를 다 했어.
재밌는 이야기가 많아서 혼자 웃으면서 봤다.
누가 웃긴 짤이랑 영상도 올려서 더 재밌었어.
나도 몇 마디 거들고 나니까 또 대화가 시작됐다.
단톡방 보는 것도 시간이 걸리긴 하지만 재밌어.
가끔 단톡방이 조용할 때는 좀 심심하더라.
이렇게 활발한 게 좋은 것 같아.
english: There were, like, 200 messages piled up in my friends' group chat.
Even if I don't check for just a few hours, messages pile up like crazy.
It took 30 minutes just to read them all.
My friends talked about everything from what they had for lunch to all sorts of stuff.
There were so many funny stories that I laughed by myself while reading.
Someone also posted funny memes and videos, so it was even more fun.
My friends' chemistry is honestly really good.
After I chimed in with a few words, the conversation started up again.
Messages started coming in dozens at a time right away.
Reading the group chat takes time, but it's fun.
I like the feeling of keeping in touch with my friends.
Sometimes when the group chat is quiet, it feels a bit boring.
I think it's good that it's this active.
Our group chat really never stops.
